meanings.definition: A person who owns or works on a ranch.
meanings.sent1: The ranchman tended to the cattle every morning.
meanings.sent2: The ranchman lived in a small house on the vast ranch.
meanings.sent3: The ranchman tried to ride a wild horse but ended up in a funny tumble.
meanings.sent4: The ranchman's dedication to his land made him the heart of the community.
meanings.sent5: The ranchman's weathered face told the story of years spent under the sun.

meanings.definition: A man who manages a ranch.
meanings.sent1: The ranchman oversaw the planting of crops and care of animals.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the ranchman checked the fences and water supply.
meanings.sent3: The ranchman's dog thought it was the real manager of the ranch.
meanings.sent4: The ranchman's leadership turned the struggling ranch into a thriving business.
meanings.sent5: The ranchman's hat and boots were symbols of his role in the community.
